<h3 id="X22746">X(22746) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th BROCARD TO OUTER-FERMAT</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*S^4+(11*SA^2-21*SW*SA+SW^2)*S^2-3*SW^2*SB*SC-sqrt(3)*(S^2-SW*(2*SA+SW))*(SA-SW)*S  :  :
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3).</p>
<p>X(22746) lies on these lines:
{15,5873}, {16,627}, {17,32}, {532,3105}, {629,3096}, {3094,5965}, {3098,22890}, {3099,22652}, {3104,9981}, {6673,7846}, {9301,16629}, {9821,9982}, {9857,22896}, {9862,22532}, {9878,9988}, {9993,22832}, {9994,22898}, {9995,22899}, {9996,16626}, {9997,22912}, {10000,22737}, {10038,22929}, {10047,22930}, {10828,22657}, {10871,22902}, {10872,22903}, {10873,22904}, {10874,22905}, {10875,22908}, {10876,22909}, {10877,22910}, {10878,22931}, {10879,22932}, {11368,11739}, {11386,22482}, {11494,22558}, {11861,22670}, {11862,22674}, {11885,22897}, {13892,22921}, {13946,22922}, {18500,22795}, {18957,18973}, {19011,19071}, {19012,19070}, {22744,22772}</p>
